entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as being sacked by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as confirming Fudge's sack and introducing Rufus Scrimgeour.

entities.name: rufus scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is introduced by Dumbledore as the new Head of the Ministry.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned in comparison to Scrimgeour by Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is the one asking questions about Scrimgeour.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as being underestimated by Scrimgeour.

relationships.description: Dumbledore confirms that Fudge has been replaced.
Dumbledore introduces Scrimgeour as the new Head of the Ministry.
Scrimgeour is said to not underestimate Voldemort by Dumbledore.
